Title:
Phylogeny of the saffron-crocus species group, Crocus series
Crocus (Iridaceae)
Abstract:
The first comprehensive phylogeny of the species of Crocus
series Crocus was obtained based on multi-locus sequence data. Using
genotyping-by-sequencing saffron (Crocus sativus) could be placed in
Crocus cartwrightianus. A segmental allotriploid origin of C. sativus
from within C. cartwrightianus is highly likely.
